Method Detail

connectSource

public void connectSource(MIDIEndpoint source)
                   throws CAException
Establish a connection from a source to a client's input port. Note: input connections are automatically lost when the setup changes (as signified by a callback to the client's MIDINotifyProc).

CoreAudio::MIDIPortConnectSource()

Parameters:
source - The source from which to create the connection
Throws:
On - error within MIDIPortConnectSource
CAException

disconnectSource

public void disconnectSource(MIDIEndpoint source)
                      throws CAException
Close a previously-established source-to-input port connection.

CoreAudio::MIDIPortDisconnectSource()

Parameters:
source - The source from which to close a connection
Throws:
On - error within MIDIPortDisconnectSource
CAException
